172. What is an availability zone?
options: B. A geographical area with redundancy within that area for compute, networking, and storage service
C. A distinct location within AWS designed to be isolated from failures

question: 173. What is a region?
options: B. A geographical area with redundancy within that area for compute, networking, and storage service
C. A distinct location within AWS designed to be isolated from failures
answers: B. A geographical area with redundancy within that area for compute, networking, and storage service

question: 174. Which of the following statements do not describe a region? (Choose two.)
options: C. A region is a collection of availability zones for redundancy.
B. A region is a virtual data center with built-in redundancy.
A. A region is an area with specific AWS managed services (compute, networking, storage, etc.).
D. A region is a geographic area with at least two virtual data centers.
answers: B. A region is a virtual data center with built-in redundancy.
A. A region is an area with specific AWS managed services (compute, networking, storage, etc.).

question: 175. Which of the following statements do not describe an availability zone? (Choose two.)
options: A. An availability zone hosts your compute instances.
D. An availability zone contains virtual data centers.
C. An availability zone is isolated from other availability zones except with regard to networking.
B. An availability zone provides redundancy for your applications.
answers: D. An availability zone contains virtual data centers.
B. An availability zone provides redundancy for your applications.

question: 176. Which of the following statements are true about availability zones? (Choose two.)
options: A. An elastic IP is always tied to one specific availability zone.
C. An availability zone’s name (for example, us-east-1a) may change across AWS accounts.
D. You can specify an availability zone in which to launch your instance when creating the instance.
B. A region always contains two availability zones.
answers: D. You can specify an availability zone in which to launch your instance when creating the instance.
C. An availability zone’s name (for example, us-east-1a) may change across AWS accounts.
